picked_headlines.summary: LightMamba enhances FPGA efficiency with quantization, outperforming GPUs.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This article highlights a significant advancement in hardware optimization, appealing to both engineers and stakeholders interested in cost-effective solutions.

picked_headlines.summary: LLP revolutionizes e-commerce pricing with LLMs, outperforming traditional models.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This article showcases the application of LLMs in a commercial setting, providing insights into practical business improvements and stakeholder value.

digest:
- *BBoxER* offers a black-box optimization method for LLM post-training, enhancing privacy and generalization without exposing gradients. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2507.01752)
- *Tiny-R1V* is a lightweight MLLM that enhances reasoning efficiency and accuracy through innovative model merging and optimization techniques. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.08987)
- *dInfer* is a new framework for efficient inference in diffusion language models, achieving significant speedups without sacrificing quality. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.08666)
- *StreamingVLM* offers a novel approach for real-time understanding of infinite video streams, enhancing efficiency and performance in VLMs. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.09608)
- *SHERLOCK* enhances e-commerce risk management using LLMs for efficient fraud detection and case analysis, improving workflow precision. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.08948)
- *GUI-Shift* enhances VLM-based GUI agents using self-supervised RL, improving automation accuracy without large annotated datasets. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2505.12493)
- *RA-Gen* introduces a multi-agent framework for controllable code generation, enhancing accuracy and user control through dynamic tool integration. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.08665)
- *CLARITY* is an AI platform for patient routing and triage, outperforming humans in speed and precision in clinical consultations. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.02463)
- *Medchain* introduces a dataset for clinical decision making and an adaptable AI system, enhancing LLM agents in real-world healthcare. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2412.01605)
- *Mnemosyne* introduces a novel unsupervised memory architecture for edge-based LLMs, enhancing dialogue realism and long-term memory retention. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.08601)
